name: public-and-publicly-accessible-toilets-in-the-uk-aggregated-by-council
title: Public and publicly-accessible toilets in the UK aggregated by council
description: Released by the ODI on behalf of the Royal College of Art Great British Toilet Map (https://greatbritishpublictoiletmap.rca.ac.uk/). This data aggregated from the GBTM and used to inform an ODI Showcase project that carried out analysis of toilet distribution across the UK (http://theodi.org/odi-showcase-great-british-public-toilet-map-provision-access-analysed). Includes open data released by the councils and user-submitted entries.

resources.name: Number of public and publicly-accessible toilets in the UK by council.
resources.description: This data is a one-off publication alongside an analysis of toilet distribution across the UK (http://theodi.org/odi-showcase-great-british-public-toilet-map-provision-access-analysed). It is correct as of 2016-10-09. The goal of the RCA is to release this data directly in future. Please note that 'permissiveLooCount' are toilets that are confirmed as being accessible to the public whereas 'customerLooCount' refers to 'customer-only' toilets and requires review from the RCA team.
